tool_description: Quickly check if the product you have is vegan/vegetarian or not (and even contains palm oil!)
name: Is It Vegan?
title: Is It Vegan?

api_list.name: isItVegan
api_list.description:
Returns json-formatted response with information about the product.

*Request:*
GET /{product-name}

*Returns:*
`{`
`  "palmOil": "YES" | "NO" | "UNKNOWN" | "MAYBE", `
`  "status": "OK" | "NOT-FOUND" | "ERROR", `
`  "vegan": "YES" | "NO" | "UNKNOWN" | "MAYBE" ,`
`  "vegetarian": "YES" | "NO" | "UNKNOWN" | "MAYBE"`
`}`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://is-it-vegan.p.rapidapi.com/oreo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "is-it-vegan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://is-it-vegan.p.rapidapi.com/{product_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "is-it-vegan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
